errorMessages.noApprovedDomains: You must set the APPROVED_DOMAINS environment variable to a list of domains or a regular expression.
errorMessages.noDriveType: No DRIVE_TYPE env variable set. Please set it to 'team' or 'folder.'
errorMessages.noDriveID: No DRIVE_ID env variable set. Set this environment variable to the ID of your drive or folder and restart the app.
errorMessages.noFilesFound:
No files found. Ensure your DRIVE_ID and DRIVE_TYPE environment variables are set correctly and that your service account's email is shared with your drive or folder.

If you just added the account, wait a minute and try again.
